subject: Sexual Health
title: Sexual vs Asexual Reproduction
description: A quick win: understand Sexual vs Asexual Reproduction.

hook.text: Some organisms clone themselves perfectly. Others mix genes with a partner. Two strategies, one goal.

buildup.text: Bacteria divide in half, creating identical copies. Starfish regrow from severed limbs. No partner needed.

discovery.text: Sexual reproduction combines genes from two parents, creating unique offspring with new traits.

twist.text: Cloning is faster and easier, yet most complex animals chose the slower path of sexual reproduction.

climax.text: Genetic diversity from sex helps species survive diseases, parasites, and environmental change.

punchline.text: Mixing genes is slower but far more resilient.

quiz.question: What is a key advantage of sexual reproduction?
